text:
I read and maked the changes about documentation of lenya, but dont work correctly. I'm creating a new publication (customized) based on http://lenya.apache.org/docu20/tutorials/newPublication14.html, on execute the url for this publication my tomcat return JRE error:

java.lang.StackOverflowError
	java.util.Collections$SynchronizedMap.get(Unknown Source)
	org.apache.lenya.transaction.IdentityMapImpl.get(IdentityMapImpl.java:50)
	org.apache.lenya.cms.repository.SessionImpl.getRepositoryItem(SessionImpl.java:212)
	org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.PublicationManagerImpl.getPublication(PublicationManagerImpl.java:91)
	sun.reflect.GeneratedMethodAccessor52.invoke(Unknown Source)
	sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(Unknown Source)
	java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Unknown Source)
	org.apache.avalon.excalibur.component.ComponentProxyGenerator$ComponentInvocationHandler.invoke(ComponentProxyGenerator.java:143)
	$Proxy50.getPublication(Unknown Source)
	org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.DocumentFactoryImpl.getPublication(DocumentFactoryImpl.java:331)
	org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.templating.PublicationTemplateManagerImpl.getPublications(PublicationTemplateManagerImpl.java:167)
	org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.templating.PublicationTemplateManagerImpl.getPublications(PublicationTemplateManagerImpl
creator: charles@seberino.com.br
